metadata.title: CVE-2017-18201 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GNU libcdio before 2.0.0. There is a double freein get_cdtext_generic() in lib/driver/_cdio_generic.c.

criterions.comment: libcdio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
